data.text: @denisrancourt Une lecture aussi intéressante que fascinante. Merci de l'avoir partagée.

@saneandbrave @denisrancourt @conaugodja @DowdEdward @IamBrookJackson I know! I wish too. There are people who've been injured or lost someone who wake up every day realizing they've been lied to. But I don't see general awakening, after two years they're either awake or they aren't. I might be wrong, though.
@milehijules @denisrancourt @conaugodja @DowdEdward @IamBrookJackson I know - I think it was just a 'wish thought'!

@saneandbrave @denisrancourt @conaugodja I don't think many more are going to wake up on their own. Even with it in their face on Twitter, it'a bigger red pill than most can deal with. Follow @DowdEdward and @IamBrookJackson for Wall St & life ins industry impacts that even the MSM can't hide forever. It will be brutal.
@milehijules @denisrancourt @conaugodja 👍 when do you think ppl are going to wake up to what is happening at last?

@denisrancourt @conaugodja What makes you think anyone in the pandemic authority was trying to avoid authoritarianism? That's what they used, and that's the world ahead of us. It will be much worse than what the Nazis had in mind since even the Nazis didn't plan on enslaving their own people.
@denisrancourt @luigi_warren The injection record holding MD in my region has an outstanding political career and was recently called our hometown's #Trudeau by an opponent.

@denisrancourt Did you see the latest blog/article from Dr Malcolm Kendricks?
https://t.co/mrH3vN2F7n
@denisrancourt My maternal grandfather was a nazi collaborator, who read Doctor Mengele's (Auschwitz's torturer). Medecine has never been a science but hygienism is a totalitarism.
